musicLibrary.title: Music Library
musicLibrary.description: You know this feeling when you discover a great song for the first time? This project aims to deliver this feeling by sharing tailored Spotify playlists ranging through all genres. I built the navigation in a way to resemble how you would flip through vinyls in a box or CDs on a shelf, which is all too familiar to a music lover.

nominapress.title: Nominapress
nominapress.description: I continue to work full-time at Nominapress. We develop and maintain a human resources management app. Some notable features that I have worked on are:

randomShapes.title: Randomization
randomShapes.description: I am constantly learning how to better make code more dynamic. I had the idea to try and generate random colors. After I figured this out, I took the concept further and created random shapes of all sizes and colors that animate on random paths. The method uses Math.floor(Math.random() * number) to generate the random attributes.

gemini.title: Gemini Diversified Services
gemini.description: Gemini Diversified Services is a medical credentialing verification organization (CVO). Gemini wanted to position themselves unique against their competition, yet not stand out too different. Finding the right balance between these proved to be difficult; how far could we push the boundaries? In order to find equilibrium on the site, I used a mix of custom iconography, along with themed images and tag-lines dedicated to their California native sport - Surfing.

about.paragraphPart1: Hi, I'm Sean. I'm a designer and front-end developer based in Madrid, España. I currently work full-time for a startup, helping to create an HR Management app called
about.paragraphPart2: . I am a life-long student and I'm always trying to learn new techniques, technologies, and languages. When I'm not working or learning, you can catch me hiking the great outdoors, curating Spotify playlists, and sparking conversations with strangers.
